sentences.en: A consul's duty is to help his own nationals.
sentences.cn: 领事的职责是帮助自己的同胞.

sentences.en: A young Chinese woman enters the British Consul's Office.
sentences.cn: 一位年轻的中国妇女步入英国领事处.

sentences.en: Consul: Have a seat, please . May I know your name?
sentences.cn: 领事: 请坐. 请告诉我您的名字好 吗 ?

sentences.en: He applies to the consul for a visa.
He has forbidden his followers to pay tribute to the emperor, Consul!
sentences.cn: 他不许他的信徒给君主上贡, 大人!

sentences.en: He is applying to the Consul for a visa.
He was acting British consul in Geneva for 11 years.
sentences.cn: 他作为驻日内瓦代理英国领事已经11年了.

sentences.en: His work as a consul-tant consisted in advising foreign companies on the siting of new factories.
sentences.cn: 作为一名顾问，他的工作是为外国公司在新厂选址问题上提供建议。

sentences.en: Pinkerton and the Consul knock at the door and enter.
sentences.cn: 平克顿和领事敲门进来.

sentences.en: The British Consul in Zurich has confirmed that a British man was among the people killed.
sentences.cn: 英国驻苏黎世领事证实被害人中有一名英国籍男子。

sentences.en: The Consul and Kate leave. Butterfly falls weeping to the ground.
sentences.cn: 领事和凯特走了, 蝴蝶跌倒在地,满面泪痕.

sentences.en: The consul's consultant hauled out the assaulted from the vault.
sentences.cn: 领事的参谋把袭击者从地窖中拖了出来.

sentences.en: We had a meeting with the Consul General of Malaysia.
sentences.cn: 我们和马来西亚的总领事开了一次会.

words.tran_cn: 领事；领事馆；领事任期；领事职位
领事的任期；领事的职位

trans.tran_en: a government official sent to live in a foreign city to help people from his or her own country who are living or staying there
